Title: Ice-Watch Mango cream gold tone skull watch 38mm ICE.SK.MCM.S.S.15
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Ice-Watch Mango cream gold tone skull watch 38mm ICE.SK.MCM.S.S.15 RRP £69.95 Now £39.95 Description A soft mango coloured silicone strap topped off with a gold toned buckle clasp ensures that the Ice-Watch is secured to the wrist and gives the wearer piece of mind. A perfect addition to anybody’s spring/summer watch collection with a vibrant yet sleek mango cream casing. Protecting the dial is a layer of mineral glass to ensure that the clock is protected. The dial of the watch has gold toned skulls scattered across the face whilst being evenly placed to ensure the hour hands and the detailing of the watch does not give a cluttered and claustrophobic look. The dial of the watch is approximately 38mm in width and approximately 5mm in depth including the crown. This Ice-watch is water resistant up to 100m. All watches come boxed in an official Ice presentation box, inside the box is instructions and a two year manufacturers guarantee. Chapelle jewellery are authorised stockists of Ice-Watches. Other Brands we stock About Chapelle Chapelle Jewellery is a family run business offering jewellery and watches with discounts of up to 50% off RRP. We purchase at the best possible prices and pass on these savings to our customers. All our items are new and perfect goods; we do not sell seconds or second-hand items. We are authorised stockists of all the brands we sell so you can be confident you're buying from a reputable company. Delivery Orders dispatched within the UK will be sent using Royal Mail Recorded Signed For first class. Orders being sent to international destinations will be sent by Royal Mail International Signed For delivery. Visit our ebay store for our full range >>
